headline: They Plan To Sell Their Car And Buy 0.15 BTC As A Bet For The Future. The Response They Got? 'Just Keep The Car' If It's Only Worth $10K
summary: Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) has dropped around 28% over the past month, falling to roughly $68,000 on Wednesday. That volatility didn't stop one Reddit user from announcing a bold move. In fact, they see it as an opportunity. The post, shared in r/Bitcoin recently, was simple and direct. “I’m going all in,” they wrote. “I’m selling my car to be able to buy 0.15 btc and save for my future. Anyone here ever sold something major to buy Bitcoin? Regret it or not?” Don't Miss: Missed Nvidia and Tesla? RAD

content.title: They Plan To Sell Their Car And Buy 0.15 BTC As A Bet For The Future. The Response They Got? 'Just Keep The Car' If It's Only Worth $10K
